name: The wand of wizard
description:
-------------------------The wand of wizard----------------------

Magik boiz MAGIK!!!

Made in 3 days for cybermoonlight303 scratch contest or gamejam

I guess it is hardcore

Scratch game  -  https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/542867693/

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Wasd or arrow keys to move space key or tap to shoot

Ghosts are bad they spawn randomly per ghost you killed  you get a point and try not to touch them they warn you if they are coming by a white patch.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Theme music by funnyanimatorjimtv on scratch

Other sounds by scratch asset library

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
